tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The treatment was good . They treated me well .  The doctor were good. They gave good care . I liked  the hospital

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Shweta is a step ahead than a Doctor. Soft and polite in nature, always smiling and very friendly. More than the treatment her personal care for the individual makes me and family more comfortable to revisit her for our dental issues without any second thoughts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I felt I was in safe hands. Been coming here for many years and always feel comfortable. I am happy with the treatment procedures. Professionalism and friendliness of both Doctors are outstanding.
Pleasant environment  and high tech facility is appreciable   and feel at home

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had tooth pain due to broken filling.

Dr explained all the causes of pain n explained treatment. The entire process was painless.

Dr has all the latest instruments to diagnosis all the conditions and upto date solutions to make it better treatment.

I recommend there both clinics rajajinagar n basaveshwarnagar for the patients.

It is really good facilities n treatment. Go for it.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Have had just 2 sittings with Dr Swetha Raghavendra & 3 more to go but am already feeling better.  Her approach & body language in the first consultation itself puts u at ease. She makes the effort to explain her procedure before & after  she works on ur teeth.
Infact as a dentist couple both Dr Swetha & Dr Raghavendra display 'patience' with their 'patients', explaining their line of treatment & working out the best for u.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ************** *** ****** ************* *** explained things very clearly and also showed the real time pictures on his mobile phone and explained the gravity of the situation. I would definetly recommend all other patients sufferening from dental issues to visit him once in his Rajajinagar chamber. Thanks again Doc !!
reply_text:
Thank you so much for the kind words 
We wish you abundance of good health!!!

review: I am having improper tooth cap implantation. It was really challenging to remove the cap but yes., the doctor able to do that and I was explained about the complexities involved , especially the root canal was pain less. Here is where experience comes to picture. Overall I would like to recommend others any sort dental treatment.
